comments.raw_text:
To reproduce:
1-install most recent versions from several release branches
2-open an instance of each all at once to compare web page behaviors among them
3-wait a short period

Actual results:
1-software update window opens reporting "New Version Available" (4.0.1) equal to the highest already installed version (4.0.1)

Expected results:
1-no extra window to report "new" version available
comments.author: mrmazda@earthlink.net
